properties.displayName: _CSGP: RADIUS Misconfiguration - Exposed Device/Public IP attempting to authenticate
properties.description:
This query looks for signs of misconfiguration - a public IP address performing radius authentication. If there are any hits for this, it means that a device has been inadvertently exposed directly to the internet. 

Handling Guidance: Alert the Network team that a device may be potentially exposed to the public internet. Create a NWSP ticket or notify a Network team member.
properties.query:
// Define the list of CoStar public IP ranges, excluding Akamai
let CoStar_Public_IPs = 
    _GetWatchlist('Costar_Public_IP_Ranges')
    | where name != "akamai"
    | project cidr
    | summarize IPList = make_list(cidr);

// Filter RADIUS logs for external IPs not in CoStar's public IPs
RADIUS_Base
| where not(ipv4_is_private(CallingStationID))
    and not(ipv4_is_in_any_range(CallingStationID, toscalar(CoStar_Public_IPs)))
| summarize 
    UserNameCount = dcount(TargetUsername),
    TargetedUserNames = make_set(TargetUsername),
    TargetDevices = make_set(ClientName),
    AttackerIPs = make_set(CallingStationID)
    by ClientIPAddress, Computer
| order by UserNameCount desc
